Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/Ohio
ShortDescription: Southbound 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Exp, #2 Hyde Park Exp Temporary Northbound Reroute near Balbo/Michigan
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Park Exp & 2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Roosevelt and Outer Lake Shore Dr: due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express, #2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Roosevelt and Outer Lake Shore Dr, due to, street blockage near Balbo/Michigan.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore, #143 Stockton/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute near Balbo/Michigan
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable LSD, 143 Stockton/Michigan Exp buses temporarily rerouted NB: Michigan, Roosevelt & Outer Lake Shore Dr; SB: Columbus, Roosevelt & Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore, #143 Stockton/Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Balbo/Michigan.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Roosevelt & Outer Lake Shore Drive.

Southbound buses will operate via Columbus, Roosevelt & Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump, #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute near Balbo/Michigan
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump, 28 Stony Island buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Roosevelt & Outer Lake Shore Dr; SB: Columbus, Roosevelt & Michigan due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump, #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Balbo/Michigan.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Roosevelt and Outer Lake Shore Drive.

Southbound buses will operate via Columbus, Roosevelt and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Harrison
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Harrison due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Harrison due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near 119th/Peoria
